# clippingMode

**Instance Property**

The clipping behavior of the portal component.

## Declaration

```swift
var clippingMode: PortalComponent.ClippingMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

Provide a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/ClippingMode-swift.enum] to configure the clipping behaviors.
